title: Harvard Theological Studies
additional-notes: The earliest active renewal shown here is the first one to specifically mention this series in its CCE record.  It was filed under Books.  We have found no renewals filed under Periodicals.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue (before or after the one shown here) is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
